channel.title: grenadine on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in grenadine on Recipes

item.title: Artist's special
item.description: Ingredients 30 ml Scotch 30 ml Oloroso Sherry 15 ml Lemon juice 15 ml Grenadine or redcurrant or raspberry syrup lemon twist Instructions Shake ingredients. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

item.title: Scofflaw
item.description: Ingredients 50 ml Rye whisky 25 ml Dry vermouth 10 ml Grenadine 4 dashes Orange bitters 15 ml Lemon juice lemon twist Instructions Shake ingredients. Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.
